name: Heaven/Hell
description:
On his search for power, a Warrior from a time long past gets trapped inside a crystal of unknown origin. 

Now he must find a way out. Who knows what he might find on his journey...

Heaven//Hell is a 2D pixel plattformer with light combat gameplay and unlockable abilities.

Controlls:

A/D: Walk

Space: Jump (Double Jump if Unlocked)

W/A: Look up/Down

E: Interact

J: Attack

L: Leap (If unlocked)

K: Shockwave (If unlocked)
